CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to corroborate the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties of the polymers , top - contact organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) were fabricated using solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT , respectively , as the semiconducting layer on the octadecyltrichlorosilane ( OTS ) self - assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO 2 substrates ( see the detailed devices fabrication in the Experimental Section ).

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's identify the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PCDTBT - Polymer name
2. PCDSeBT - Polymer name
3. OTS - Material name (octadecyltrichlorosilane)
4. Si - Material name (silicon)
5. SiO2 - Material name (silicon dioxide)

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

PCDTBT
PCDSeBT
OTS
Si
SiO2
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PCDTBT
2. PCDSeBT

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to a "Material Name".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to corroborate the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties of the polymers , top - contact organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) were fabricated using solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT , respectively , as the semiconducting layer on the octadecyltrichlorosilane ( OTS ) self - assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO 2 substrates ( see the detailed devices fabrication in the Experimental Section ).

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's identify the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

1. "charge transporting properties" - This is a property of the polymers, which refers to their ability to transport charges (electrons or holes) during an electric current.
2. "heteroatom substitution" - This is a property of the polymers, which refers to the presence of atoms other than carbon in the polymer chain.
3. "top-contact organic field-effect transistors (OFETs)" - This is a type of device, which is a type of transistor that uses an organic semiconductor as the active layer.
4. "solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT" - These are properties of the polymers, which refer to the method of synthesis (solution processing) and the specific polymers used (PCDTBT and PCDSeBT).
5. "octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS) self-assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si/SiO2 substrates" - This is a property of the substrates, which refers to the type of substrate material (Si/SiO2) and the method of modification (self-assembly of OTS).

So, the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are:

* "charge transporting properties"
* "heteroatom substitution"
* "top-contact organic field-effect transistors (OFETs)"
* "solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT"
* "octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS) self-assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si/SiO2 substrates"
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. "charge transporting properties" - This refers to the ability of a material to conduct electric charge, which is a material property.
2. "heteroatom substitution" - This refers to the intentional introduction of atoms other than carbon into a polymer chain, which can affect the material's properties.

So, the entities that clearly refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph are:

1. "charge transporting properties"
2. "heteroatom substitution"

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| charge transporting properties |
| heteroatom substitution |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
